Sides as butter veg and onion rings which surprisingly taste better than the mains.

Unfortunately ribs ran out but would give it another chance next time. Hopefully the portions are bigger when dining in!

A place that worth a try!

Except for their ‘Salsa’, personally I find their salsa tomatoes taste are too strong, otherwise overall staff and food is great.

Hopefully get to try their truffle pork chop during our next visit. 😋
An Absolute Hidden Gem In e Neighbourhood I Would Say... e Food Is Great & Definitely Worth e Prices!! You'll Never Regret Trying... I'll Definitely Be Back Again~ 😋😋😋🍻🍻🍻

Below average food for above average price. Steak was not very nice and pork chop was tough  but i like the consistency. Brocoli was okay but abit msgish. Wine was veryyyy bad and dry and non nice at all. Was not a good pairing with the beef
Good food and value for money with entertainer or Burpple 1 for 1. No service charge and GST. Truffle pork chop and ribs were good.
Portion is small... $14 for 3 pcs pork ribs. Not sure if this price reasonable but the taste is not bad.

Finally tried the Bacon Carbonara my colleagues always order. Wow... the generous portion of smoky carbon (more like char siew lor... so thick n juicy) stacked on top of creamy pasta is delicious! $9 for such quality! I also love Sausage Mushroom Pomodoro pasta as I’m more of tomato sauce person. Will keep returning! My dream combo would be this bacon with tomato base!

Chanced upon Say Cheese when I was on the way to my grandma's house and decided to try for myself. Was looking for some drinks and the friendly staff recommended me Caramel Milk Tea ($4.50). I topped up $0.50 for cheese foam and the end result was amazing! The caramel wasn't too sweet, which was perfect and the cheese foam complemented the drink really well. Flavour was very balanced and you have the cheese after-taste which was better than I expected it would be :D they have mains on the menu as well, and I will definitely be back again!
Their fish n chips yery value for money and taste great! The sides are curly fries.  I luv the lychee tea too❤️ A bit secluded spot
I love the carrot cake, traditional and not greasy at all. Well presented. It will be my new hangout.
love the food here looks like im gonna be  a regular hehehe. staffs are also nice n friendly

Lovely place for grilled food. I recommend their Signature Grilled Chicken Diablo with Demi Glace. It usually comes with salad and normal fries for the 2 sides.

The owner let me try the Dirty Fries — fries with parmesan, nacho cheese and teriyaki sauce. I must say the triple combo is satisfying. Besides that, the chicken is well grilled and the balsamic vinegar is pretty good. I like the fact that I could ask them to separate the balsamic vinegar from the chicken.

Last of all, the salad is fine. It’s better than the generic coleslaw with that all too familiar factory-made sauce. The fresh vegetables delight me!

I will come again for sure. I want to try their pizza.

We chanced upon this stall when we were examining our dinner options in this area. While it was newly opened (for less than a month), the quality of food served surpassed our expectations.
We ordered salmon with fresh veg, truffle fries, nuggets (came with a small serving of veg), and a Hawaiian pizza.
The salmon and fries were delicious, nuggets tasted better than the ones you find at fast food outlets, and the pizza was soft and easy to chew, probably due to it being hand-stretched before being cooked.
Prices were reasonable considering the food quality and portions served.
Highly recommended!

Great western food in a cozy environment. We’ve come here for the pizza as its hand made and fresh out from the oven. As well as the carbonara turkey bacon and the fish and chips, great choice and fulfilling too!
Come and check it out! ✌🏻
Super affordable and delicious thick beef patty! So much nicer than another nearby western food. Thumbs up. Returned for their single patty cos dbl is too much for me.
Great food, one of the best spring chicken that I've tried, may have to wait a bit (10 - 15 minutes)

I order Grill platter take away with sides: coleslaw and sweet potato fries (had to pay extra $0.50). When I reach home, the set contain all the wrong sides, ie, whipped potato and corn broccoli (both I don’t eat). Paying extra and not getting what I ordered is really not the main issue. Spoiling my whole dinner experience was really upsetting. This will be the last time I dine with Jws.
Horrible experience... Last week take away black pepper pork chop reach home realise never give black pepper sauce... Today order coleslaw reach home realise is spoilt with foul smell...

Do not be deceived by the displays talking about the lovely steaks they serve. The sirloin I just had is literally the driest, most rubbery medium rare I ever had. On some bites, I even wonder if this is some sort of bad mock meat. The only thing I could taste was the mushroom sauce. Be warned...

Edit 4 July 2020: We decided to give JWS another chance and ordered the chicken and broccoli spaghetti in marinara sauce. This is without a doubt the worst shaghetti we had in our collective lifes. Shame on the cook who so obviously doesn't care about his/her work.
Pork chop is very good. Not quite like the cheese over the veg, French fries is served hot but not crispy

The steak were absolutely delicious, perfect medium steak..
Thanks for the free nuggets for the birthday freebies!

Cheers team.. Next time again 😍👌🏽
Despite its name Grille Factory, this place does not make window/door grilles. They grill meat.
Tender beef! Great quality for the competitive price. Staff is not that friendly but no complaints for the price.
Your food is always tasty, fresh cooked and your prices are very reasonable. Please go on doing quality. We all need it.
Steak is very good ! Ok
attitude is rude, unpleasant.
Good taste with reasonable price
Love their steak
Delicious!
